definitions.definition: A belief in the importance of full and unambiguous assent to the whole of a religious teaching.
A style of American poetry that draws on the personal history of the poet.
A system of government that proportionally distributes political and institutional power among religious and ethnic communities.

main_definition: ( religion ) A belief in the importance of full and unambiguous assent to the whole of a religious teaching.
secondary_definitions: ( poetry ) A style of American poetry that draws on the personal history of the poet.
A system of government that proportionally distributes political and institutional power among religious and ethnic communities.
